sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import {tap,startWith,map} from 'rxjs/operators'; import { AuthService } from 'src/src-app/services/auth.service'; import { TokenService } from 'src/src-app/services/token.service'; import { MatSnackBar, MatSnackBarHorizontalPosition, MatSnackBarModule, MatSnackBarVerticalPosition, } from '@angular/material/snack-bar'; import { ThisReceiver } from '@angular/compiler'; import { Categorie } from 'src/src-api/Categorie/model'; import { CategorieService } from 'src/src-api/Categorie/service'; ​ ​ @Component({ selector: 'app-manage-categorie', templateUrl: './manage-categorie.component.html', styleUrls: ['./manage-categorie.component.css'] }) export class ManageCategorieComponent implements OnInit { category!:Categorie; CategorieForm!:FormGroup; categories$!:Observable; deleted=true; horizontalPosition: MatSnackBarHorizontalPosition = 'start'; verticalPosition: MatSnackBarVerticalPosition = 'bottom'; role: string = this.tokenService.getinfoToken(); myControl = new FormControl(''); options: Categorie[]; filteredOptions: Observable; id:number; ​ constructor(private router:Router,private serviceCategorie:CategorieService,private formBuilder:FormBuilder,private tokenService:TokenService,private authService: AuthService,private _snackBar: MatSnackBar) { } ​ ngOnInit(): void { this.CategorieForm=this.formBuilder.group({ id:[null], titre:[null], description:[null], image:[null] }); this.categories$=this.serviceCategorie.getAllCategories(); this.serviceCategorie.getAllCategories().subscribe(data=>{ console.log(data) this.options=data }) ​ } ​ onSave(){ ​ this.serviceCategorie.addCategorie(this.CategorieForm.value).pipe( tap(()=>this.router.navigateByUrl('/Categories')) ).subscribe(); // this.router.navigateByUrl('/Categories') } OnClose(){ this.router.navigateByUrl('/Categories/manage_Categories') } OnUpdate(id:number){ this.serviceCategorie.get(id).subscribe(data=>{ console.log(data) this.CategorieForm.patchValue({ id:data.id, titre:data.titre, description:data.description, image:data.image ​ }); }) } update(){ this.serviceCategorie.update(this.CategorieForm.value).pipe( tap(()=>this.router.navigateByUrl('/Categories')) ).subscribe(); } onDelete(id:number){ this.id=id } delete(){ this.deleted=false; if(this.role ==="specialiste" || this.role==="admin"){ console.log("delete") console.log(this.id) this.serviceCategorie.delete(this.id).subscribe() this.router.navigateByUrl('/Categories') this._snackBar.open('la categorie est supprimée', 'Hide', { horizontalPosition: this.horizontalPosition, verticalPosition: this.verticalPosition, }); // this.demandSupression.description="supression de categorie de id"+this.id // this.demandSupression.status="en cours" // this.demandSupression } else{ this._snackBar.open('vous etes pas authorise votre demande etait envoyée!!', 'Hide', { horizontalPosition: this.horizontalPosition, verticalPosition: this.verticalPosition, }); ​ } ​ } ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ }
